text: لَهُۥ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ۖ وَهُوَ ٱلْعَلِىُّ ٱلْعَظِيمُ

translation.en.sahih: To Him belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is in the earth, and He is the Most High, the Most Great.
translation.id.indonesian: Kepunyaan-Nya-lah apa yang ada di langit dan apa yang ada di bumi. Dan Dialah yang Maha Tinggi lagi Maha Besar.
